name: CRM4WordPress
author: Max Rover Research

sections.description: When someone posts a comment on your blog his/her details will be captured in the BatchBook CRM system. This is done by using the BatchBook API’s (http://developer.batchblue.com). Currently the users name, email, website, date of comment and link/url of comment is passed to the BatchBook system.

short_description: When someone posts a comment on your blog his/her details will be captured in the BatchBook CRM system. This is done by using the BatchBook API's (http://developer.batchblue.com). Currently the users name, email, website, date of comment and link/url of comment is passed to the BatchBook system.
